comment.author: 8990571@N02
comment._content: I don't know what this group represents, but some of the Europeans look familiar to me..in fact  I think they are people who later ( if not at the time of this picture) were teachers at Achimota Secondary School, in Achimota, near Accra.  I attended this school from 1961 to 1963, and one of my housemothers was Marion Harbourn, and I believe the woman in the center of the line of people is her.  Maybe they all just look like I remember my teachers looking,,,it IS 50 years ago!!!
